list.name: customer
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pg_stat_single_table" WITH KEY = "customer" WHERE "customer" <> 'you'

list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pg_stat_single_table" WITH KEY = "host" where customer='$customer'

list.name: database_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pg_stat_single_table" WITH KEY = "db_name" where customer='$customer' and host='$host'

list.name: table_name
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "pg_stat_single_table" WITH KEY = "table_name" where customer='$customer' and host='$host' and db_name='$database_name'
